column5: Is there anything better then the smell of bacon cooking over the camp stove on a nice quite morning while camping
I can think of a few things.....eating it for one....and watching you cook it for two.  :-)   I'll have a black coffee with that please and my eggs over easy with white toast and no beans.  Enjoy!
roughin it sux eh ...i feel for ya ...  almost makes me think of what "cave men " did back in the day to get away from it all  Enjoy!
haha Are you typing this as you "rough it" ?
This is what I call "roughing it"...
put your cell phone away if you're camping!!!
2 blond's cooking it for you while a brunette makes some espresso  lol
